name: Again 2
description:
Race against everybody!

Your goal is to cruise around the race track and go through ALL the checkpoints!

Every checkpoint gives you random points. 

Be the first on the Global leaderboard.

Also, the car has an mp3 player :D

Controls:

WASD - move

Esc - pause

Warning: Server issues may occur I try my best to fix them as fast as I can.

The game and the leaderboard were developed by me, using assets from the Assets store or creating my own.

Special thanks to Alex for the copyright-free music:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx0_M61F81Nfb-BRXE-SeVA
